item.description: I can't believe that it is time for our 3rd annual Holiday Fun and Cheer get together!!  It is always a lot of fun and laughs.  Bring an organic raw vegan dish enough for 6 to 8 people.  If you are new and not sure what to bring a salad (fruit or veggie) is always good.  If you want me to make a dish for you I would be happy to for $15.  We will be having a Yankee Swap ($10) which always brings out the best in everyone :)  It is totally optional.  KO will also have a few raffle giveaways.  It is always a great night to get together.  Hope to see everyone there.  Happy Holidays!!!

group.name: Manchester Raw Vegan Food Meetup Group

item.name: Happy Holidays!! Potluck Dec 2!!
